scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: In this letter, Edmund Clarence Stedman writes to Virginia Terhune Van de Water honoring her request for an autograph by sending a verse from his poem "Pan in Wall Street." An engraving of Stedman is also included in the collection.

did.unittitle: Letter from Stedman to Mrs. F.F. Van de Water 17 February 1890

scopecontent.p: Edmund Clarence Stedman to Mrs. F.F. Van de Water, honors Mrs. Van de Water's request for an autograph by including four lines of poetry from "Pan in Wall Street" and his signature.
